Hi! What's up? Hello!
Where are you going cat?
/// ---------------------------------------
I’m going to the park ghost-bird.
What are you going to do there? Why are you going there? Why are you going to the park?
/// ---------------------------------------
I’m going to do some volunteering work. Can I come with you? May I come with you?
Of course mate! Everyone can become volunteer if they want to. Awesome! Let's go!
I’m sorry but it’s a personal thing. Ok, I understand. Good luck!
/// ---------------------------------------
I want to apologise to my friends for some bad actions.
Ok. Good luck!
/// ---------------------------------------
I want to pick up some flowers. Flowers? Why?
I want to give them to my grandma. Is something wrong with her?
She has a serious illness :( I'm very sorry to hear that :(
/// --------------------------------------------------------------------- /// dialogue items when given stuff from inventory
I don't really need that but thanks. Mmm ... no. Nope. Nope. Nope.
No? Really? ... I'm a little sad now.
That's cool! Thank you! Thanks! Oh, how nice of you! Thanks!
No problem.
Awesome! Thank you! I needed this! I've always wanted one of these! I love it! Thank you!
Hey, no problem at all! Glad you like it!
